title: Conditional 8th Item Slot for Wards.
body:
You would have to have all of your item slots filled for this slot to be available and you cannot purchase Sight Wards if you already have Sightstone (but you could still buy a Vision Ward).

I think this could be good considering the Trinket Meta has turned into 4 Sweeping Lenses, 1 Farsight Orb.

replies.body:
That's where Riot's balance went wrong horribly and they know that, hence they are approaching it from a slightly different angle which is good to see. Nerfing and buffing policy still needs the change however.

You don't choose what is the meta for the players, you don't balance or counter balance because some emerged meta is undesirable for you.

After years of consecutive failures in the balancing scene I am pretty sure Riot knows somewhere in their heart, that the today's shoe holed meta is half their fault (the other half is the players'). Hence S4 and now S5.

S3 particularly was the product of this type of balancing taken into extreme. Which is not good.

This would just make it so the team with control has even more control over the game.

Hint: 5 pinks and sweepers means if your in the lead there is no way to lose the lead.
